long_description: our refractory manufacturing industry is a quality driven organization, guided by the founder late mr karimulla. we offer these services after complete planning and designing of the rcc chimney. further our team is managed and guided by our expert mentor mr. sheik hasena who has achieved excellent exposure in rcc chimney's construction services by providing complete client satisfaction. we use latest and high-performance machinery & equipment's in our services. we provide these services in various parts of the country and make a permanent relationship with our esteemed clients. our mines situated in bhimadole taluk, west godavari district region of andhra pradesh in india. our industry also produces ball clay and fire clay powders, refractory bricks and materials in technically advanced refractory manufacturing process plants, located at three different places in west godavari, andhra pradesh. fulfilling the industrial demand of vitrified tiles, sanitary wares and refractory materials the ball clay of karimulla industries has become an essential processed-ore for vitrified tiles, sanitary wares, refractories, mortars, castables & allied products.

generated_description: karimullaindustries, legally known as karimulla shaw qadari ceramics company, specializes in the construction of rcc chimneys and the manufacturing of various types of high-quality refractory bricks, ball clay powders, and fireclay mortars. the company also undertakes boiler refractory lining, erection, and commissioning works. their services are primarily aimed at clients involved in the development of new projects or the production of power plants, cement plants, dairy and food industries, agro industries, paper industries, modern rice mills, and steel plants. the company has a particular focus on the south indian market.
